imdb.title: Robotics;Notes
imdb.plot: 2019, Divergence Ratio 1.048596. The near future, where a device popularly called the PokeCom, packaged with PhoneDroid OS, spreads, bringing the Augmented Reality world close to existence. Central Tanegashima High School's Robot ...

episodes.title: Ganvareru ga Matterukara
episodes.plot: The Robot Research Club is in dire straits - there are only two members and the future of the club is in jeopardy. Despite this, the club's leader, Akiho, is intent on building a life-sized robot based on her favorite anime, GUNVARREL!

episodes.title: Yume to Kibo to Roman ga Attekoso
episodes.plot: The Robot Research Club is going to be shut down unless it can win the upcoming ROBO-ONE tournament. Akiho and Kaito have to somehow find a hobby robot and master its controls in only two weeks.

episodes.title: Tanegashi Akuseru Inpakutoooooo!
episodes.plot: At last, the Robot Research Club enters the Robo-One tournament! Can Kaito's revolutionary control scheme be enough to win the tournament and save the club?

episodes.title: Issho ni, Seigi no Kyodai Robo o Tsukuro u
episodes.plot: Subaru seeks Kaito's help for the upcoming ROBO-ONE World Championship in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Akiho struggles to keep the club funded while Kaito reflects on a life-changing incident.

episodes.title: Oniichan tte Yonde Iidesuka?
episodes.plot: Kaito and Junna set out to investigate the strange "ghost" that Kaito caught a glimpse of... but only succeed in discovering more mysteries.

episodes.title: Yume ga Owatchattara, Sabishii
episodes.plot: Subaru and Kaito start practicing for the upcoming ROBO-ONE world tournament in Las Vegas. During his off-time, Kaito stumbles upon a mysterious room inside the abandoned folk museum.

episodes.title: Arigato Gojaimashitat
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Tennoji Nae desu. Yoroshiku!
episodes.plot: Akiho is elated when a grown-up Nae Tennoji offers to help the Robot Research Club build a giant robot. Meanwhile, Kaito is caught in a typhoon while searching for the elusive Kimijima Report No. 2.

episodes.title: Chi to Ase to Namida no Kessho Desukara
episodes.plot: At long last, the Robot Research Club completes its giant GunBuild-1 robot! And, as people from all over the island watch, the robot takes its historic first step!

episodes.title: Uchira Dakarakoso Tsukureru Robo o
episodes.plot: After the outcome of the GunBuild-1 start-up test, Subaru tries to convince Akiho to build a new robot from scratch. Meanwhile, Kai unexpectedly makes the discovery of the century.

episodes.title: Furagu ga Tassei Saremashita
episodes.plot: The final, unaired episode of GUNVARREL is leaked online and Kaito is surprised that it describes a grim ending that's identical to Kimijima's report.

episodes.title: Doko ka Hitotsu demo Suki ni Natte Kureru made
episodes.plot: The Robot Research Club is shocked to hear that not only has Doc been rushed to the hospital, but also he is considering closing his shop. Junna tries to encourage him to keep it open, but her fear of robots makes it difficult.

episodes.title: Nanto Iu Kurutta Sekai
episodes.plot: Experiments with the magnetic monopole get underway, and more information from the Kimijima Reports comes to light. Details about an impending solar storm are revealed.

episodes.title: Sukoshi Dake no Mama de...
episodes.plot: After a solar storm knocks out power all over Tokyo, robots throughout the city run berserk and attack! Now it's up to Kaito to shut down the robots and save the entire Tokyo metropolitan area somehow...

episodes.title: Kimi ni Yume o Misete Ageyo
episodes.plot: Airi finds her existence threatened when major maintenance is scheduled for the IRUO. Server. While Airi clings to the hope of a snowy miracle, Kaito learns more about her past.

episodes.title: Kyodai Robotto ga, Daisuki desu
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Robotto Kenkyu-bu wa, Honjitsu o Motte Kaisan shimasu!
episodes.plot: After the accident with GunBuild-2, the school's vice principal shuts down the Robot Research Club for good and orders that all of the club's robots be dismantled.

episodes.title: I Should Never Have Had a Dream
episodes.plot: Chaos erupts at the Robot Expo as Misaki starts destroying robots left and right. In the aftermath, Kaito uncovers a massive discovery.

episodes.title: Imademo Robotto ga Suki desuka
episodes.plot: With five billion lives at stake, Akiho declares that she WILL defeat Kou Kimijima! The question is... how?

episodes.title: Ganvareru Hasshin!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Kokokara wa Oretachi no Gemu da
episodes.plot: Kaito and Misaki face off in a final showdown with only minutes left until the BHB rocket is launched. Kaito begins to take the lead by knocking Misaki out, which allows Kimijima to take control with more mobile units.
